year.description: Year at time of clone (redundant from template, stored for convenience).

photo_url.description: Primary image URL (often mapped to image_url or vehicle_image in code).

created_at.description: Timestamp when the vehicle record was created.

last_event_at.description: Timestamp of the vehicle's last logged event.

stock_data_id.description:
FK  vehicle_template.id. Template the vehicle was cloned from.

Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `vehicle_data.id`.<fk table='vehicle_data' column='id'/>

title.description: User-defined display title (optional override of make/model/trim).

spec_snapshot.description: JSONB snapshot of the entire template row at clone time.

horsepower_hp.description: How much horsepower the vehicle has.

torque_ft_lbs.description: How much torque the vehicle has.

engine_size_l.description: The size of the vehicles engine (L).

cylinders.description: The number of cylinders the vehicle's engine has.

fuel_type.description: The type of fuel the vehicle uses.

drive_type.description: The type of drivetrain the vehicle has.

transmission.description: The type of transmission the vehicle has.

length_in.description: The length of the vehicle in inches.

width_in.description: The width of the vehicle in inches.

height_in.description: The height of the vehicle in inches.

body_type.description: The body type or style of the vehicle.

colors_exterior.description: The exterior color of the vehicle.

epa_combined_mpg.description: EPA reported average fuel efficiency combined highway and city driving.

avg_mpg.description: The vehicle's actual miles per gallon fuel efficiency.
